titles.title: A resolution to authorize representation by the Senate Legal Counsel in the case of LaFreniere v. Congress of the United States.
A resolution to authorize representation by the Senate Legal Counsel in the case of LaFreniere v. Congress of the United States.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Authorizes the Senate Legal Counsel, in conjunction with counsel for the House of Representatives, to represent Congress in the case of LaFreniere v. Congress of the United States.
